project.name: X3D examples: archive top level
project.description: Creation and customization of Ant build.xml files for each X3D examples archive using a common template.

target.name: upload.CommonFiles
target.description: scp upload of X3dResources.html and other common files to all online example archives

echo.message: first update web3d.org, then update savage, then update savageDefense...
scp upload common files to Web3D.org scp://${sftpServer.web3d}${sftpDirectory.web3d.examples}
scp upload common files to X3dGraphics.com scp://${sftpServer.X3dForWebAuthors}/${sftpDirectory.X3dForWebAuthors.examples}
scp upload common files to X3dGraphics.com scp://${sftpServer.X3dForWebAuthors}/${sftpDirectory.X3dForAdvancedModeling.examples}
scp upload common files to savage.nps.edu scp://${sftpServer.savage}${sftpDirectory.savage}
scp upload common files to savageDefense.nps.navy.mil scp://${sftpServer.savageDefense}${sftpDirectory.savageDefense}

target.name: sshexec.cleanup.all
target.description: sshexec cleanup of unwanted backup files in all X3D Example archives on various servers

echo.message: sshexec cleanup of unwanted backup files in all X3D Example archives on various servers

target.name: sshexec.cleanup.savage
target.description: sshexec cleanup of unwanted backup files in savage X3D archives

echo.message: sshexec cleanup of unwanted backup files in ssh://${sftpServer.savage}${sftpDirectory.savage}

sshexec.command: cd ${sftpDirectory.savage}; rm -rfv ${backupFilesPattern}; echo ${sftpServer.savage} server cleanup complete

echo.message: sshexec list and then cleanup unwanted .svn directories in ssh://${sftpServer.savage}${sftpDirectory.savage}

sshexec.command: cd ${sftpDirectory.savage}; ls -ald `find . -name \.svn` ; echo ${sftpServer.savage} server .svn directory listing complete
cd ${sftpDirectory.savage}; rm -rfv `find . -name \.svn` ; echo ${sftpServer.savage} server .svn directory cleanup complete

target.name: sshexec.cleanup.savageDefense
target.description: sshexec cleanup of unwanted backup files in savageDefense X3D archives

echo.message: sshexec cleanup of unwanted backup files in ssh://${sftpServer.savageDefense}${sftpDirectory.savageDefense}

sshexec.command: cd ${sftpDirectory.savageDefense}; rm -rfv ${backupFilesPattern}; echo ${sftpServer.savageDefense} server cleanup complete

target.name: sshexec.cleanup.web3d
target.description: sshexec cleanup of unwanted backup files in web3d.org X3D archives

echo.message: sshexec cleanup of unwanted backup files in ssh://${sftpServer.web3d}${sftpDirectory.web3d.examples}

sshexec.command: cd ${sftpDirectory.web3d.examples}; rm -rfv ${backupFilesPattern}; echo ${sftpServer.web3d} server cleanup complete

echo.message: sshexec list and then cleanup of unwanted backup files in ssh://${sftpServer.web3d}${sftpDirectory.web3d.examples}

sshexec.command: cd ${sftpDirectory.web3d.examples}; ls -ald `find . -name \.svn` ; echo ${sftpServer.web3d} server .svn directory listing complete
cd ${sftpDirectory.web3d.examples}; rm -rfv `find . -name \.svn` ; echo ${sftpServer.web3d} server .svn directory cleanup complete

target.name: sshexec.cleanup.X3dForAdvancedModeling
target.description: scp cleanup of unwanted backup files in X3D archive

echo.message: sshexec cleanup of unwanted backup files in ssh://${sftpServer.X3dForWebAuthors}${sftpDirectory.X3dForAdvancedModeling.examples}

sshexec.command: cd ${sftpDirectory.X3dForAdvancedModeling.examples}; rm -rfv ${backupFilesPattern}; echo ${sftpServer.X3dForWebAuthors} server cleanup complete

echo.message: sshexec list and then cleanup of unwanted backup files in ssh://${sftpServer.web3d}${sftpDirectory.X3dForAdvancedModeling.examples}

sshexec.command: cd ${sftpDirectory.X3dForAdvancedModeling.examples}; ls -ald `find . -name \.svn` ; echo ${sftpServer.web3d} server .svn directory listing complete
cd ${sftpDirectory.X3dForAdvancedModeling.examples}; rm -rfv `find . -name \.svn` ; echo ${sftpServer.web3d} server .svn directory cleanup complete

target.description: scp cleanup of unwanted backup files in X3D archive

sshexec.command: cd ${sftpDirectory.X3dForWebAuthors.examples}; rm -rfv ${backupFilesPattern}; echo ${sftpServer.X3dForWebAuthors} server cleanup complete

echo.message: sshexec list and then cleanup of unwanted backup files in ssh://${sftpServer.web3d}${sftpDirectory.X3dForWebAuthors.examples}

sshexec.command: cd ${sftpDirectory.X3dForWebAuthors.examples}; ls -ald `find . -name \.svn` ; echo ${sftpServer.web3d} server .svn directory listing complete
cd ${sftpDirectory.X3dForWebAuthors.examples}; rm -rfv `find . -name \.svn` ; echo ${sftpServer.web3d} server .svn directory cleanup complete

echo.message: Master copy of HelloWorld.x3d scene is maintained in X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter01TechnicalOverview
Prerequisite for this target: build master HelloWorld scene; then this target copies results to root directories of of various example archives
X3dForAdvancedModeling/HelloWorldScenes directory tests internationalization (I18N) by collecting variations in many languages
X3dForWebAuthors is master version, invoked above so no need to copy
